page.title: 07YOUTH IN JERSEY
page.content: There is nothing much to do in the area that we live in apart from Youth Clubs which are mostly on Friday nights. Most weekends we travel into town and spend our time in youth clubs there, or walking round town. We also spend our evenings in town as well. We also organise our own parties when one of us has the house free. They usually last until about eleven or twelve o'clock and any thing goes. In the summer there are more parties than usual because people organise beach parties which usually go on until early morning. We have these parties because there is nothing else to do around our area for people of our age. Being a young teenager in Jersey is difficult, because we are too young to get into pubs or nightclubs.
